trans-unit.source: Represents an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) Schema validation engine.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述驗證引擎。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 無法繼承 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 類別 (Class)。

trans-unit.source: Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will compromise the security of your code.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，將危害您的程式碼的安全性。

trans-unit.source: XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊。不接受其在受信任的案例。

trans-unit.source: Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述驗證錯誤訊息和例外狀況可能會公開機密資訊的內容模型或結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。

trans-unit.source: Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers.
trans-unit.target: 請小心不要公開給未受信任的呼叫端的這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class provides an efficient, high-performance mechanism to validate XML data against XML schemas in a push-based manner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別提供有效率的高效能機制，可根據 XML 結構描述以推入方式驗證 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class allows you to validate an XML infoset in-place without having to serialize it as an XML document and then reparse the document using a validating XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別可讓您就地驗證 XML 資訊集，而無需將其序列化為 XML 文件，然後使用驗證 XML 讀取器重新剖析該文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class can also be used to build validation engines over custom XML data sources or as a way to build a validating XML writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>類別也可用來建置驗證引擎，透過自訂的 XML 資料來源，或做為建置驗證 XML 寫入的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>類別，請參閱[XmlSchemaValidator 推入型驗證](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation> validation flags of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object are not set be default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema>和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation>驗證旗標<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件不是集合是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.XmlResolver%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object is `null` by default.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.XmlResolver%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件是`null`預設。

trans-unit.source: As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，外部結構描述中參考包含，import 或 redefine 項目不會解決預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔案對`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> object containing element and attribute names as atomized strings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> 物件，包含原子化字串形式的項目和屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> object containing the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas used for validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 物件，包含用於驗證的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> object used for resolving namespaces encountered during validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> 物件，用於解析驗證期間遇到的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags" /> value specifying schema validation options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags" /> 值，指定結構描述驗證選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> parameter are copied into an internal <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> or the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation> validation options are set.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>參數複製到內部<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>物件時<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation>設定驗證選項。

trans-unit.source: As a result, changes to the input <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object during validation do not affect the outcome of validation.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，變更為輸入<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>物件驗證期間不會影響驗證的結果。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> parameter specified is not compiled, its <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>未編譯指定的參數，其<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> parameter is especially important for validating `xs:QName` types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>參數，請務必特別驗證`xs:QName`型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class does not copy the in-scope namespaces from the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object but instead holds a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>類別不會複製範圍內命名空間的<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>物件，但改為包含它的參考。

trans-unit.source: This allows new namespaces to be added to the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object during the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓新的命名空間加入至<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>驗證程序期間的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation> validation flags of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object are not set be default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema>和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation>驗證旗標<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件不是集合是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.XmlResolver%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object is `null` by default.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.XmlResolver%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件是`null`預設。

trans-unit.source: As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，外部結構描述中參考包含，import 或 redefine 項目不會解決預設值。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor, see the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>類別參考主題。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the parameters specified are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個指定的參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while compiling schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 參數中的結構描述時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object to add to the set of schemas used for validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件，該物件要加入一組用於驗證的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Adds an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema to the set of schemas used for validation.
trans-unit.target: 將 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述加入一組用於驗證的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.AddSchema%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.AddSchema%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.AddSchema%2A> method can be used to simulate the effect of encountering an inline XML schema in the XML document being validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.AddSchema%2A>方法可用來模擬遇到內嵌 XML 結構描述驗證 XML 文件中的效果。

trans-unit.source: The target namespace of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> parameter cannot match that of any element or attribute already encountered by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> 參數的目標命名空間與 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 物件已遇到之任何項目或屬性的目標命名空間均不相符。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> validation option is not set, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.AddSchema%2A> method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema>未設定驗證選項，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.AddSchema%2A>方法不會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> parameter specified is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The target namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> parameter matches that of any element or attribute already encountered by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 參數的目標命名空間與 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 物件已經遇到之任何項目或屬性的目標命名空間都相符。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 參數是無效的。

trans-unit.source: Ends validation and checks identity constraints for the entire XML document.
trans-unit.target: 結束驗證，並檢查整個 XML 文件的識別條件約束。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.EndValidation%2A> method ends validation and checks identity constraints for the entire XML document if the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints> validation option is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.EndValidation%2A>方法結束驗證，並檢查整個 XML 文件的識別條件約束，如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints>設定驗證選項。

trans-unit.source: An identity constraint error was found in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 文件中找到識別條件約束錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Returns the expected attributes for the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前元素內容的預期屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute" /> objects or an empty array if there are no expected attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute" /> 物件的陣列；如果沒有預期屬性，則為空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedAttributes%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement%2A> method, all the attributes that could appear in the XML document are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedAttributes%2A>方法之後，立即呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement%2A>方法，可能會顯示為 XML 文件中的所有屬性會都傳回。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedAttributes%2A> method is called after one or more calls to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute%2A> method, the attributes that haven't yet been validated for the current element are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedAttributes%2A>方法在一個或多個呼叫後呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute%2A>方法，這個方法會傳回尚未尚未驗證目前元素的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the expected particles in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前元素內容中的預期物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaParticle" /> objects or an empty array if there are no expected particles.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaParticle" /> 物件的陣列；如果沒有預期物件，則為空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: The valid particles that can be returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> method are instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny> classes.
trans-unit.target: 可由 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> 方法傳回的有效物件為 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> 及 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the compositor for the content model is an `xs:sequence`, only the next particle in the sequence is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當內容模型的複合器為 `xs:sequence` 時，只傳回序列中的下一個物件。

trans-unit.source: If the compositor for the content model is an `xs:all` or an `xs:choice`, then all valid particles that could follow in the current element context are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容模型的複合器為 `xs:all` 或 `xs:choice`，則傳回目前項目內容中所有後續的有效物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema and XML document that follow, after validating the `book` element, the `book` element is the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在隨後的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述及 XML 文件中，驗證 `book` 項目之後，`book` 項目會成為目前的項目內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> method returns an array containing a single <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> object representing the `title` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> 方法會傳回包含單一 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> 物件的陣列，該物件表示 `title` 項目。

trans-unit.source: When the validation context is the `title` element, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證內容為 `title` 項目時，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> 方法會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> method is called after the `title` element has been validated but before the `description` element has been validated, it returns an array containing a single <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> object representing the `description` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果在驗證 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> 項目之後、驗證 `title` 項目之前，呼叫 `description` 方法，則它會傳回包含單一 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> 物件的陣列，該物件表示 `description` 項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> method is called after the `description` element has been validated then it returns an array containing a single <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny> object representing the wildcard.
trans-unit.target: 如果在驗證 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetExpectedParticles%2A> 項目之後呼叫 `description` 方法，則它會傳回包含單一 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny> 物件的陣列，該物件表示萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the following XML as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例使用下列 XML 做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the following XSD schema as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例使用下列 XSD 結構描述做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> to populate with <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute" /> objects for any attributes not yet encountered during validation in the element context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />，要用驗證期間尚未在項目內容中遇到之任何屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute" /> 物件填入。

trans-unit.source: Validates identity constraints on the default attributes and populates the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> specified with <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute" /> objects for any attributes with default values that have not been previously validated using the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> method in the element context.
trans-unit.target: 對預設屬性驗證識別條件約束，並針對先前尚未使用 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 方法在項目內容中驗證預設值的任何屬性，以其 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute" /> 物件填入指定的 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes%2A> method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes%2A>驗證目前項目使用的所有屬性之後，必須呼叫方法<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes%2A> method should be used to determine what default attributes are to be inserted into the XML document being validated.
trans-unit.target: 應使用 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes%2A> 方法，判斷要將哪些預設屬性插入要驗證的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the state of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the state of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.Initialize%2A> method is only valid if called immediately after the construction of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object or after a call to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.EndValidation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.Initialize%2A>方法才會有效建構之後立即呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件或呼叫後<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.EndValidation%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔案對`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the state of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object using the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> specified for partial validation.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.Initialize%2A> method that takes an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> as a parameter initializes an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object to its starting state for partial validation.

trans-unit.source: The `orderNumber` schema element is passed by selecting the schema element by <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable> collection returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.GlobalElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object then validates this specific element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 物件會驗證此特定項目。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.LineInfoProvider%2A> property returns 0 for the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo.LineNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo.LinePosition%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.LineInfoProvider%2A>屬性會傳回 0 代表<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo.LineNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo.LinePosition%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> object whose properties are set if the current element content is successfully skipped.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> 物件，如果順利略過目前項目內容，則會設定此物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Skips validation of the current element content and prepares the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object to validate content in the parent element's context.
trans-unit.target: 略過目前項目內容的驗證，並準備 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 物件，以驗證父項目內容 (Context) 中的內容 (Content)。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement%2A> method skips validation of the current element content and prepares the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object to validate content in the parent element's context; it is equivalent to skipping validation for all the children of the current element and then calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement%2A>略過目前項目內容的驗證方法，並準備<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件以驗證父項目的內容中的內容; 它相當於略過目前項目的所有子系的驗證，然後呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the current element content is successfully skipped, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> object's (if specified) <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.NotKnown>.
trans-unit.target: 如果順利跳過目前項目內容，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>物件的 （如果已指定）<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.NotKnown>。

trans-unit.source: No validation errors are reported on skipped content.
trans-unit.target: 略過的內容會不報告任何驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> after calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" />。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> object was passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.Initialize%2A> method, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute%2A> method validates the attribute against the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute> object.

trans-unit.target: 如果在目前內容中，已成功驗證項目名稱<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>物件的 （如果已指定） <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsNil%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性會設定與驗證的結果。

trans-unit.source: If the element name or any of its attributes are invalid the current context, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Invalid>; otherwise the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.NotKnown>.
trans-unit.target: 如果無效的項目名稱或其任何屬性目前的內容，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Invalid>，否則為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.NotKnown>。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔案對`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The element's name is not valid in the current context.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> method is called after calling <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element to validate.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證之元素的命名空間 (Namespace) URI。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> object whose properties are set on successful validation of the element's name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> 物件，在成功驗證項目名稱時會設定其屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 元素的 <c>xsi:Nil</c> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <c>xsi:SchemaLocation</c> attribute value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的 <c>xsi:SchemaLocation</c> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <c>xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation</c> attribute value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的 <c>xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation</c> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates the element in the current context with the <c>xsi:Type</c>, <c>xsi:Nil</c>, <c>xsi:SchemaLocation</c>, and <c>xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation</c> attribute values specified.
trans-unit.target: 驗證目前內容中已指定 <c>xsi:Yype</c>、<c>xsi:Nil</c>、<c>xsi:SchemaLocation</c> 和 <c>xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation</c> 屬性值的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element name is successfully validated in the current context, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> object's (if specified) <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsNil%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> properties are set with the results of the validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果在目前內容中，已成功驗證項目名稱<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>物件的 （如果已指定） <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsNil%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性會設定與驗證的結果。

trans-unit.source: If the element name or any of its attributes are invalid in the current context, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Invalid>; otherwise the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.NotKnown>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在目前內容中，無效的項目名稱或其任何屬性<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Invalid>，否則為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.NotKnown>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation> value was not passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor, `xsi:SchemaLocation` and `xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation` attribute values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation>值並未當做參數傳遞<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，`xsi:SchemaLocation`和`xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation`屬性值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The element's name is not valid in the current context.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱在目前內容中無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> method is called after calling <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateElement" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Verifies if the text content of the element is valid according to its data type for elements with simple content, and verifies if the content of the current element is complete for elements with complex content.
trans-unit.target: 對於具有簡單內容的元素，根據元素的資料類型驗證它的文字內容是否有效；對於具有複雜內容的元素，驗證目前元素的內容是否完整。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> object whose properties are set on successful validation of the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> 物件，在成功驗證項目時會設定其屬性。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Verifies if the text content of the element is valid according to its data type for elements with simple content, and verifies if the content of the current element is complete for elements with complex content.
trans-unit.target: 對於具有簡單內容的元素，根據元素的資料類型驗證它的文字內容是否有效；對於具有複雜內容的元素，驗證目前元素的內容是否完整。

trans-unit.source: The parsed, typed text value of the element if the element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有簡單內容，則為此元素之已剖析的具類型文字值。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For elements with simple content, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method verifies that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type and returns the parsed typed value.
trans-unit.target: 具有簡單內容的項目<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法會驗證項目的文字內容是否根據其資料類型有效，且傳回的已剖析的具類型的值。

trans-unit.source: The text content of the element is obtained from the results of previous calls to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的文字內容取自先前呼叫的結果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For elements with complex content, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method verifies if the content of the current element is complete.
trans-unit.target: 具有複雜內容的項目<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法會驗證目前項目的內容是否完整。

trans-unit.source: If the element has a default value, the value returned from the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method is the default value for the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目都有預設值，此值會傳回從<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法則是項目的預設值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object was constructed with the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints> value as a parameter, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method checks the identity constraint rules (if any) that apply to the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件以建構<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints>值做為參數，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>識別條件約束規則 （如果有的話） 的方法會檢查套用至項目。

trans-unit.source: If the element is successfully validated in the current context, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> object's (if specified) <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> properties are set with the results of the validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已成功驗證在目前內容中，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>物件的 （如果已指定） <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsDefault%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性會設定與驗證的結果。

trans-unit.source: The element's content is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 項目的內容無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> method is called after calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> object whose properties are set on successful validation of the text content of the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> 物件，在成功驗證此項目的文字內容時會設定其屬性。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The typed text content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的具類型文字內容。

trans-unit.source: Verifies if the text content of the element specified is valid according to its data type.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定元素的資料類型，驗證此元素的文字內容是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The parsed, typed simple content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素之已剖析的具類型簡單內容。

trans-unit.source: If you are validating against the `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, or `xs:unique` identity constraints, do not use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要針對驗證`xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，或`xs:unique`識別條件約束，請勿使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A> method and pass it the value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 請改為呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>方法並將它傳遞項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method overload, which takes <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> as an argument, to verify that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type.
trans-unit.target: 然後呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法多載會採用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>做為引數，來檢查項目的文字內容是否根據其資料類型有效。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For elements with simple content, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method verifies that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type and returns the parsed typed value.
trans-unit.target: 具有簡單內容的項目<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會驗證項目的文字內容是否根據其資料類型有效，且傳回的已剖析的具類型的值。

trans-unit.source: The text content of the element is obtained from the typed content passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 從具型別做為參數傳遞的內容取得項目的文字內容。

trans-unit.source: If calls to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A> method have been previously made, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>方法可能先前已，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If the element has complex content an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目具有複雜內容<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object was constructed with the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints> value as a parameter, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method checks the identity constraint rules (if any) that apply to the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件以建構<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints>值做為參數，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>識別條件約束規則 （如果有的話） 的方法會檢查套用至項目。

trans-unit.source: If the element is successfully validated in the current context, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> object's (if specified) <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> properties are set with the results of the validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已成功驗證在目前內容中，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>物件的 （如果已指定） <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.IsDefault%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性會設定與驗證的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔案對`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The element's text content is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 此項目的文字內容無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> method was not called in the correct sequence (for example, if the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> method is called after calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" />), calls to the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> method have been previously made, or the element has complex content.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> 方法 (例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> 方法)、先前已呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> 方法，或此項目具有複雜內容。

trans-unit.source: The typed text content parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 具型別之文字內容參數不能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> object whose properties are set on successful verification that all the required attributes in the element context are present.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo" /> 物件，在成功驗證項目內容中的所有必要屬性都已存在時會設定其屬性。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether all the required attributes in the element context are present and prepares the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object to validate the child content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 驗證項目內容中的所有必要屬性是否均已存在，並準備 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 物件以驗證項目的子內容。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes%2A> method should always be called before <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes%2A>方法一律會呼叫之前<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes%2A> method must be called before proceeding with validation of an element's content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes%2A>繼續項目內容的驗證之前，必須呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: If all the required attributes in the element context are present, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> object's (if specified) <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Valid>.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目內容中的所有必要的屬性不存在，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo>物件的 （如果已指定）<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity.Valid>。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔案對`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the required attributes in the current element context were not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到目前項目內容中的一或多個必要屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> after calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndOfAttributes(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.SkipToEndElement(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo)" />。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the parameters specified are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個指定的參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates whether text is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the text for validation if the current element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 驗證目前項目內容中是否允許文字，並且累積文件以驗證目前項目是否有簡單內容。

trans-unit.source: A text <see langword="string" /> to validate in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 目前項目內容中要驗證的文字 <see langword="string" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates whether the text <see langword="string" /> specified is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the text for validation if the current element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 驗證在目前項目內容中是否允許指定的文字 <see langword="string" />，並在目前項目具有簡單內容的情況下，彙總文字以進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element has simple content, the text `string` specified is concatenated on each call to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A> method until the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有簡單內容，文字`string`指定串連每次呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>方法，直到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method is called, all the text is validated.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>呼叫方法時，會驗證所有文字。

trans-unit.source: If the element has complex content, no text concatenation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目具有複雜內容，就會不發生任何文字串連。

trans-unit.source: The text <see langword="string" /> specified is not allowed in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 在目前項目內容中不允許指定的文字 <see langword="string" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> method is called after calling <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The text <see langword="string" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 文字 <see langword="string" /> 參數不能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /><see langword="delegate" /> used to pass the text value as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /><see langword="delegate" />，用於將文字值當做與屬性之 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 類型相容的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型進行傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Validates whether the text returned by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /> object specified is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the text for validation if the current element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 驗證在目前項目內容中是否允許指定之 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /> 物件傳回的文字，並在目前項目具有簡單內容的情況下，彙總文字以進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element has simple content, the text `string` specified is concatenated on each call to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A> method until the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有簡單內容，文字`string`指定串連每次呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText%2A>方法，直到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A> method is called, all the text is validated.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateEndElement%2A>呼叫方法時，會驗證所有文字。

trans-unit.source: If the element has complex content, no text concatenation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目具有複雜內容，就會不發生任何文字串連。

trans-unit.source: The text <see langword="string" /> specified is not allowed in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 在目前項目內容中不允許指定的文字 <see langword="string" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> method is called after calling <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateText" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The text <see langword="string" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 文字 <see langword="string" /> 參數不能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates whether white space is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the white space for validation if the current element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 驗證在目前元素內容中是否允許空白字元，並在目前元素具有簡單內容的情況下，彙總空白字元以進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: A white space <see langword="string" /> to validate in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 要在目前項目內容中驗證的空白區 <see langword="string" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates whether the white space in the <see langword="string" /> specified is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the white space for validation if the current element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 驗證在目前項目內容中是否允許指定之 <see langword="string" /> 中的空白區，並在目前項目具有簡單內容的情況下，彙總空白區以進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: White space is not allowed in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 在目前項目內容中不允許空白區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> method is called after calling <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /><see langword="delegate" /> used to pass the white space value as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /><see langword="delegate" />，用於將空白字元值當做與屬性之 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 類型相容的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型進行傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Validates whether the white space returned by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /> object specified is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the white space for validation if the current element has simple content.
trans-unit.target: 驗證在目前項目內容中是否允許指定之 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter" /> 物件傳回的空白區，並在目前項目具有簡單內容的情況下，彙總空白區以進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: White space is not allowed in the current element context.
trans-unit.target: 在目前項目內容中不允許空白區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> method was not called in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 未按正確的順序呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> method is called after calling <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateWhitespace" /> 之後呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidateAttribute" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> that receives schema validation warnings and errors encountered during schema validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可接收結構描述驗證期間遇到的結構描述驗證警告和錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler> is specified, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown for all schema validation errors with an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType> value of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Error>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler>指定，則<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>就會擲回的所有結構描述驗證錯誤，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType>值<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Error>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is not thrown for validation warnings with an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType> value of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Warning>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>才會擲回的驗證警告<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType>值<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Warning>。

trans-unit.source: The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔案對`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object sent as the sender object of a validation event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，該物件是以驗證事件的傳送者物件形式傳送。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" />; the default is this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，預設為這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a validation event, see the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidationEventHandler> event.
trans-unit.target: 如需驗證事件的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.ValidationEventHandler>事件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> object used to resolve <c>xs:import</c> and <c>xs:include</c> elements as well as <c>xsi:schemaLocation</c> and <c>xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation</c> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 物件，用於解析 <c>xs:import</c> 和 <c>xs:include</c> 元素，以及 <c>xsi:schemaLocation</c> 和 <c>xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation</c> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> object; the default is an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 物件，預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation> validation flags of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object are not set be default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema>和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessSchemaLocation>驗證旗標<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件不是集合是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.XmlResolver%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> object is `null` by default.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator.XmlResolver%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>物件是`null`預設。

trans-unit.source: As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，外部結構描述中參考包含，import 或 redefine 項目不會解決預設值。
